bio: My name is Sebastian Aldi. I am an undergraduate student that has experience in web and mobile programming. I also have participated in data science competitions, but I do not consider myself a pro at it. Python is my go to language for stuff because I have the most experience with it (started at my second year of university on 2018, kind of became my favorite language after that). The only things I do not use python for are games (I know pygame exists but I haven't learned it. However, Godot uses GDScript, a python-like scripting language), web programming (I used PHP during my university days, I have experience with Flask but not Django. I am interested in Django though), and mobile programming (Not supported unless using Kivy or PyQt, haven't learned them).

projects.name: temaninklusi.id
projects.desc: A website that aims to help students with ASD. Information regarding the subject is broken into small cards that is formatted using rich text. Uses React.js for frontend and Firebase for backend. Sadly the code is closed source.

projects.name: UPH-CPBot
projects.desc: A discord bot that sends a message when there is a Codeforces contest in 24 hours. Made for UPH Competitive Programming Club using Discord.js and request (for interacting with Codeforces API).

projects.name: AutoMemer
projects.desc: A discord bot that sends a meme from the subreddit r/dankmemes. Takes one meme every hour, and calls the Reddit API for new memes when the previous memes have all been posted. Hosted at heroku for my personal discord server.

projects.name: sebastianaldi17.github.io
projects.desc: My old personal site hosted using github pages. Site is created using HTML, CSS, and javascript. Bootstrap was used to make the interface. Animate on Scroll (AOS) was used to animate the content when it is visible. Click on this card to visit my old site.

projects.name: Space Defender
projects.desc: A multiplayer space invader clone made using Godot.

projects.name: JavaDESRSA
projects.desc: A Java program made to demonstrate DES and RSA encryption. Interface is made using JavaFX, encryption is done using javax.crypto and java.security.

projects.name: PredictAccidentSeverity
projects.desc: A python web application made using Dash and scikit-learn. Dataset is taken from Kaggle, machine learning method used is decision tree.

timeline.title: Undergraduate Admission
timeline.content: Started computer science undergraduate program at Universitas Pelita Harapan.

timeline.title: 9th place Ideafuse
timeline.content: Reached 9th place at ACM-ICPC Ideafuse Multi-Provincial Contest together with Liang Cai and Winston Renatan. Travelled to Medan for the finals :D

timeline.title: Calculus I-II Assistant Lecturer
timeline.content: Became an assistant lecturer for Calculus I and II. I check their homework, record their score, and sometimes teach during tutorial sessions.

timeline.title: Finalist Maranatha
timeline.content: Managed to get to the on-site finals at ACM-ICPC Maranatha at Bandung. Competition was tighter since more competent teams were there.

timeline.title: PROLOG Jury
timeline.content: Became one of the team members at National Programming and Logic Competition (PROLOG 2018). Made some multiple choice pseudocode questions, pretty nice.

timeline.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
timeline.content: Helped a lecturer to do their research. Learned about OpenCV along the way.

timeline.title: 5th place Ideafuse
timeline.content: Reached 5th place at ACM-ICPC Ideafuse Multi-Provincial Contest together with Nicky Logan and Ray Antonius. We got to the ICPC Jakarta regionals due to being top 5, peak of my competitive programming career for sure.

timeline.title: Informatics Student Association
timeline.content: Joined Informatics Student Association (Himpunan Mahasiswa Program Studi Informatika) as a member of their Student Development division.

timeline.title: Falcon Project 9 event division member
timeline.content: Handled Falcon Project 9's programming contest. For the first time I felt being at the other side of DOMJudge :)

timeline.title: ICPC Jakarta Regionals, 38/14th place
timeline.content: The certificate said 14th place, actual placement at scoreboard is 38th place. I still cannot figure out how do they count the ranks for the certificates...

timeline.title: Computer Graphics Assistant Lecturer
timeline.content: Became an assistant lecturer for Computer Graphics, along with Liang Cai. Learned WebGL and Three.js by preparing materials for the students.

timeline.title: Shopee Code League participant
timeline.content: Joined Shopee Code League with Winston Renatan, Grand Marcell and Alessandro Luiz Kartika. Learned about TensorFlow and Keras. Got a free T-shirt :D

timeline.title: Falcon Project 10 Problemsetter
timeline.content: Became one of the problemsetters for Falcon Project 10. Now I make (some of) the problems for DOMJudge >:)

timeline.title: Shopee National Data Science Contest participant
timeline.content: Joined NDSC with Winston Renatan, Grand Marcell and Alessandro Luiz Kartika. Reached 6th at one of their problems, they will send a T-shirt soon :3

timeline.title: ICPC Jakarta Regionals
timeline.content: My second and last regional contest. Got a golden ticket through Indonesia National Contest 2020, did not achieve anything great. Will show the rank after certificate is given out.
